rules_text:
Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.
Target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until your next turn.
You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, gain control of it.”
special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.
[0]: Target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until your next turn.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, gain control of it.”
